name: The Great Biohazard Escape
description:
An unfortunate mishandling of alien substances and now you're infected with a deadly virus and are contained in a biohazard zone.
You desperately want to get out.

This is a Point'n'Click Adventure-Escape Game made during the ludumDare 35 compo in 48H.

If you get stuck use the walkthrough.

this is a slightly improved post-jam version. for original jam version see link below. 

This is a Flash game, it only works in a compatible browser such
as Firefox (it does not play in Chrome). Also the Flash plugin needs to
be downloaded and enabled in your browser.
